parameters.query: ={{ `INSERT INTO zip_outlets (code, city, name, is_active) VALUES ('lcdstock-${$json.outlet_slug}', 'Москва', '${$json.outlet_name}', true) ON CONFLICT (code) DO NOTHING;` }}

parameters.jsCode:
const state = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { success: true, shop: 'lcdstock', category: state.category_name, outlet: state.outlet_name, products_total: state.products.length, saved_to_db: true } }];

const state = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { success: true, shop: 'lcdstock', category: state.category_name, outlet: state.outlet_name, products_total: state.products.length, saved_to_db: false, products: state.products } }];
